meanings.definition: Refuse to admit the truth or existence of something.
meanings.sent1: She always tries to deny her mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to deny knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds deny the presence of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The child's laughter cannot deny the joy in the room.

meanings.definition: Refuse to give or grant something requested or desired.
meanings.sent1: The store may deny your return without a receipt.
meanings.sent2: They will deny your request for a refund.
meanings.sent3: The hungry dog will deny any treat offered.
meanings.sent4: The locked door denies entry to the room.
meanings.sent5: The closed sign denies any further customers.

meanings.definition: State that one is not guilty of or responsible for something.
meanings.sent1: He will deny any involvement in the crime.
meanings.sent2: She denies being the one who broke the vase.
meanings.sent3: The cookie jar denies being empty.
meanings.sent4: The wind denies the stillness of the night.
meanings.sent5: The smile on her face denies any sadness within.
